articles.description: Latest football news and transfer rumours, as well as reaction and build-up to Champions League matches.
articles.title: Latest football news: Champions League reaction & build-up

articles.description: Harry Kane scores two goals to help Bayern Munich overturn a first-leg deficit against Lazio and advance to the quarter-finals of the Champions League.
articles.title: Kane scores two as stylish Bayern beat Lazio

articles.description: Preview followed by live coverage of Tuesday's Champions League game between Real Sociedad and Paris Saint Germain.
articles.title: Real Sociedad v Paris Saint Germain

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she is "not too concerned" about tournament results, as the priority this year is to develop her game.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: Briton 'not too concerned' about tournament results

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Rodri's unbeaten run now stands at an incredible 59 games. BBC Sport discusses why he is so important to the team.
articles.title: 'Best midfielder in the world' - Man City's invincible Rodri

articles.description: Mark Wood replaces fellow seamer Ollie Robinson in England's only change for the final Test against India in Dharamsala starting on Thursday.
articles.title: Wood replaces Robinson for fifth Test

articles.description: Mohammed Ben Sulayem, president of Formula 1's governing body, allegedly told officials not to certify the Las Vegas circuit for its race last year.
articles.title: Mohammed Ben Sulayem: FIA president allegedly told officials not to certify Las Vegas GP

articles.description: Jamie Vardy's header gives Leicester a crucial win in the Championship title race as they beat Sunderland.
articles.title: Vardy gives Leicester vital win at Sunderland

articles.description: With the Under-20 Six Nations producing senior internationals quicker than ever before, BBC Sport looks at why Henry Pollock might be England's next breakthrough star.
articles.title: Why Pollock may be England’s next breakthrough star

articles.description: Former Wimbledon champion Simona Halep is free to play again after a four-year doping ban was reduced to nine months.
articles.title: Simona Halep: Wimbledon champion ready to return to tennis 'invigorated'
